page.title: 10PUBLIC HOUSES IN WESTON
page.content: There are{five public house}in the area of Weston. In the village is the {White Horse,}owned by Greene King breweries but managed by a new tenant. The{Red Lion,}a Greene King house, is the oldest, and is situated near the green. {The Thatched {House,}now without a thatched roof, is owned by McMullans brewery.{The {Rising Sun,} also owned by them, is situated at Halls Green and has recently been extended and refurbished. Some of the land at Halls Green site was exchanged for land near the Thatched House in 1965. At Friends Green is{The Anchor}public house complete with a boat in the childrens play garden. There have been several changes of landlord there in the past five years. All of the pubs are popular.
